content:
Summary of Progress on Adapting the Teamwork Platform:

* Working closely with team members to gain a deep understanding of workflows, processes, and preferences
* Initiated design of systems specifically tailored to meet the unique needs of the organization
* Holistic approach to encompass the entire organization and prioritize changes
* Focus on prototyping system changes for creative teams to test and refine changes before rolling out to other teams and workflows
* Continuation of codifying workflows and designing systems around each team
* Recommendations for consistent terminology throughout the platform to eliminate confusion and ease the adaptation process for employees
* Confident that the process will result in systems tailored to meet the specific needs of each team and workflow
* Visual map to align expectations, designs, and timelines to be provided next week
* Process of adapting the Teamwork platform takes time and patience, but a solid foundation is being laid for the systems being implemented
* End result will be worth the wait and any questions or concerns can be addressed by the team. Cooperation and understanding are greatly appreciated.
